i would never question you i respect your opinion as a professional nigga i just want you to listen to what im tellin you what happened between l and you - forget it people know you won the battle they wont give you the credit a lot o people dont wanna admit it but i consider it a real privilege to bear witness to ya lyrics and be involved with sharing the merits im forever indebted i just need you to chill for a second so i can send a positive message like 2pac before he left us the author or the work ethic genesis has inspired me to write the exobus scripts as a constant reminder not to forget bis but ive reached a precipice remember rip you cant rhyme forever theres always a ripper with better shit i keep you out the public eye for a reason youre a commodity rip aint that how you wanna keep it i keep ya whereabouts secret i bring bitches to the crib every weekend so why is you beefin
